sources.title: Saddle Aces (1935) REX BELL
sources.description:
Stars: Rex Bell, Ruth Mix, Buzz Barton
Director: Harry L. Fraser

A convicted murderer and a safe cracker pull off a daring train escape while handcuffed together. They later show up at a ranch where they help a young woman being swindled by a large cattle company.

TRIVIA: The first of four films made by Resolute Productions, Inc. that had Rex Bell, Ruth Mix, and Buzz Barton billed above the title.

metadata.Plot: Prisoners Steve and Montana escape the law by jumping from a moving train. Hiding in Jane Langton's wagon thay are soon caught up in her struggle with land grabber Sutton. Sutton makes her a prisoner and delivers her across the border. Steve rescues her and returns to face Sutton while Montana uses his safe cracking talent to retrieve her deeds from his safe.
metadata.Writer: Jay J. Kaley, Harry L. Fraser
metadata.Actors: Rex Bell, Ruth Mix, Buzz Barton
